Binoy Chemmagate

Binoy Chemmagate is a product manager at callstats.io, a WebRTC monitoring service which analyses and optimizes the quality of multimedia in real-time communication. At callstats.io, he leads the product and partnerships. He received his masters degree in communication engineering from Aalto University, Finland in 2012. He has been working in the Telecom and Networking industry for the past 9 years.
